General.Name: Auren Energia S.A.
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Auren Energia S.A. engages in the planning, construction, installation, operation, and maintenance of renewable energy generation assets in Brazil. It operates wind, solar, and hydroelectric energy generation systems with a total installed capacity of 3.3 gigawatts. The company was formerly known as VTRM Energia Participações S.A. and changed its name to Auren Energia S.A. on March 23,2022. Auren Energia S.A. is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Doutora Ruth Cardoso, 8501, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 05425-070
